author: Dorsetier
title: Premier Inn near Waterloo -
text: Good value for money We didn't need transport - with a small suitcase if was an easy walk from Waterloo Station. The room was as always very clean, no frills but all the basics were included. Good if you just need a clean comfortable place to stay.
